events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it does not meet my expectations.
The issue was categorized as Refund because the customer requested a return and refund for the purchased product.
The support ticket was assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product to proceed with the refund?
The order number is 45893021. The product is not as described, and I am very disappointed, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned item. I will send you the return label shortly.
Thanks for helping me so quickly. I appreciate the return label being sent so fast.
Your refund case is now resolved. Once we receive the returned product, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to see if you had any issues with the return process or if you received your refund already.
I returned the product yesterday and received my refund today. Thank you for your support!
We are glad your refund was completed successfully. Closing this case now, and feel free to reach out anytime.
